Talk_1_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I'm plumb out of <clr:0000>apples<clr:ffff>! If I don't have my
most important ingredient, say goodbye to
rich, full flavor!
Talk_1_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS_00>I like to make a big deal out of it, but...


Anyone can make it. All you need is an
apple, a mushroom, and a pot.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>You should try making some!
Talk_1_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>Mmm... My nose is detecting an aroma, a
sweet, tangy, pleasant aroma.<sp:5:1:0> Could it
be?<sp:5:1:0> Do you have an <clr:0000>apple<clr:ffff>?
Talk_1_4:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:TalkPositive_00>I thought I was so ready to energize folks
around here with my <clr:0000>fruit and mushroom
mix<clr:ffff>...
But I've got no <clr:0000>apples<clr:ffff>! I'm missing my
most important ingredient!
Talk_1_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>Right. Of course. As if you'd just magically
have one... My nose is rarely mistaken, 
but I understand.
Now, if you did have an <clr:0000>apple<clr:ffff>, I'd let you
in on some <clr:0000>fruit and mushroom mix<clr:ffff>
goodness. So keep that in mind.
Talk_1_5:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_00>Wow! You're really generous!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>I'm giving you first crack at some grub.
Hold on a sec!
Talk_1_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Notice_01>It, uh, seems like your pouch is full.


If you want to sample my fabulous
cooking, you'll need to be able to hold it!
Talk_1_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS_01>New kid! It looks like you cleared some
space in your pouch.

I'll get on with the cooking right away!
Talk_1_6:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think_01>If I just had an <clr:0000>apple<clr:ffff>, I could whip up
some <clr:0000>fruit and mushroom mix<clr:ffff>...
Talk_1_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_01>It'll be better for both of us if you sample
my cooking while it's piping hot!

Hurry up, and clear some space in your
pouch so I can get cooking!
Talk_1_9:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I'm calling it "Burmano's special fruit and
mushroom mix"! Looks tasty, doesn't it?
Talk_1_1:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Angry_00>Hey, are you new here? You may scoff,
but I know a fresh face when I see one.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>I can say that because I'm a newcomer
too! My name's Burmano, and they put
me in charge of cooking for some reason.
I want to say something fancy like, "For
today's menu, we have a <clr:0000>fruit and
mushroom mix<clr:ffff> that'll rev you right up!"<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_01>Yeah... I was really looking forward to
saying that, but...
